DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Drugs use chemotherapy use different way stop tumor cell divide stop grow die . PURPOSE : Phase II trial study effectiveness paclitaxel treat patient locally advance , metastatic , recurrent cancer vulva .
DOC.brief_title: Paclitaxel Treating Patients With Locally Advanced , Metastatic , Recurrent Cancer Vulva
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine therapeutic activity paclitaxel patient locally advance , metastatic , recurrent squamous cell carcinoma vulva . - Determine objective response rate duration response patient treated drug . - Determine acute side effect drug patient . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive paclitaxel IV 3 hour day 1 . Treatment repeat every 21 day maximum 10 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 9 week . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 16-29 patient accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Histologically confirm squamous cell carcinoma vulva Not suitable radiotherapy surgery firstline treatment Measurable evaluable disease At least 1 bidimensionally measurable target lesion Measurable metastatic disease outside previously irradiate area OR Local recurrence within previously treat area OR Local lesion show progression treatment No brain metastasis PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : 18 Performance status : WHO 02 ECOG 02 Life expectancy : At least 3 month Hematopoietic : Not specify Hepatic : Bilirubin great 1.5 mg/dL AST/ALT le 2 time upper limit normal Renal : Creatinine clearance great 60 mL/min Cardiovascular : No prior concurrent cardiac disease ( i.e. , uncontrolled high blood pressure , unstable angina , congestive heart failure , myocardial infarction within past year , cardiac ventricular arrhythmia require medication , 2nd 3rd degree heart block ) Other : No peripheral neuropathy great grade 1 No serious active infection No prior allergic reaction drug contain Cremophor EL No serious medical , psychological , familial , social condition would preclude study Not pregnant nursing Fertile patient must use effective contraception PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy : Not specify Chemotherapy : No prior chemotherapy except concurrent therapy radiotherapy Endocrine therapy : Not specify Radiotherapy : See Disease Characteristics See Chemotherapy No concurrent radiotherapy Surgery : Not specify
